passive.name: A Knight's Pilgrimage
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the wearer's Ultimate DMG based on their Max Energy. Each point of Energy increases the Ultimate DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>, up to {{3}} points of Energy.
